thread.title: BRIEF-Aerie Pharmaceuticals Announces Pricing Of Public Offering Of Common Stock

title: BRIEF-Aerie Pharmaceuticals Announces Pricing Of Public Offering Of Common Stock

organizations.name: brief-aerie pharmaceuticals announces pricing of public offering of common stock
brief-aerie pharmaceuticals announces pricing of public offering of common st

text:
33 AM / in 25 minutes BRIEF-Aerie Pharmaceuticals Announces Pricing Of Public Offering Of Common Stock Reuters Staff 
Jan 24 (Reuters) - Aerie Pharmaceuticals Inc: 
* AERIE PHARMACEUTICALS ANNOUNCES PRICING OF PUBLIC OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK 
* AERIE PHARMACEUTICALS INC - ‍PRICED ITS REGISTERED UNDERWRITTEN PUBLIC OFFERING OF $75 MILLION OF SHARES OF ITS COMMON STOCK​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
